statements: SELECT * FROM TelemedicineRecommendations;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM TelemedicineRecommendations;
SELECT * FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, recommendation FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT * FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 40 AND 50 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, recommendation FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%cold%'
SELECT * FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, recommendation FROM TelemedicineRecommendations WHERE age < 20 AND (diagnosis = 'Migraine' OR diagnosis = 'Headache') ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_date, outcome FROM Treatments
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC, patient_id
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT patient_name, age, outcome FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_type='Surgery'
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT recommended_treatment, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, treatment_name, outcome FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recommendation_date;

SELECT patients.name, patients.age, treatments.treatment_name, recommendations.recommended_treatment FROM patients INNER JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id INNER JOIN recommendations ON patients.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_description FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, recommendation_date FROM patients p JOIN recommendations r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis, outcome_description FROM patients p JOIN medical_history mh ON p.patient_id = mh.patient_id JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, duration FROM treatments WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, outcome_description FROM medical_history JOIN outcomes ON medical_history.treatment_id = outcomes.treatment_id;

SELECT patients.name, treatments.treatment_name, outcomes.outcome_description FROM patients JOIN recommendations ON patients.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id JOIN treatments ON treatments.treatment_id = recommendations.recommended_treatment_id;
